MetaLookupInterface

MetaLookupInterface.php : 38

It is a common problem to couple binary data with their metadata.

This interface provides a method for returning metadata object based on the binary file path.

Table of Contents

getMetadata() Returns metadata coupled with a file. Resource

Methods

Returns metadata coupled with a file.

public getMetadata( $path : string , $meta : Resource [, $require : bool = false ] ) : Resource
Parameters
$path : string

path to the data file

$meta : Resource
$require : bool = false
